about_the_game:
Unlocks all current and future levels in Box Maze 2.
(Playing the game will unlock each level as you complete it, this DLC does not unlock additional content, it allows the player to choose levels without needing to unlock them first)
detailed_description:
Unlocks all current and future levels in Box Maze 2.
(Playing the game will unlock each level as you complete it, this DLC does not unlock additional content, it allows the player to choose levels without needing to unlock them first)
name: Box Maze 2 - Unlock All Levels

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1.8Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9500 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: Box Maze 2 hardly uses any computing power and is very likely to run smooth on most computers. If your pc has lower specs than this and runs the game without issues please let us know so we can look into it and update this information.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above.
  • Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9800 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

short_description: Unlocks all current and future levels in Box Maze 2. (Playing the game will unlock each level as you complete it, this DLC does not unlock additional content, it allows the player to choose levels without needing to unlock them first)
